profile.name: David Heinemeier Hansson
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer at 37signals
profile.summary: Results-driven software engineer with a passion for building scalable and maintainable systems. Skilled in Ruby, Conductor, and TextMate 2.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer at 37signals
description: Developed a stripped down Rails bundle for TextMate 2, improving the overall development experience.
Worked on the Hyprland Wiki Pages project, syncing the website with the wiki to provide seamless user experience.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Maintained and improved various open-source projects, including Conductor.
Collaborated with clients to deliver high-quality software solutions.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Contributed to the development and maintenance of Conductor.
Ensured the project's stability and security through regular updates and bug fixes.
